Lan dau den cug nhu lan cuoi dc ban be gioi thieu quan chu teo kha ngon gd mjnh dy so dong 10ng ma da duoc dat ban truoc hai ngay .chu nhat gd minh den luc 5h30 ban da dat truoc nhu vay rui den ma con k co ban nua ne...minh noi chu le nao chui the lun do do co am be nho dy no cu khoc doi vo..ma tu le tan bao ve quan ly noi chien nhu thanh phan a c doi kh ve co ban sap xep ban cho a c..day dat ban truoc lam cai dach gi. ( de ton tien dt choi ha may thanh )Ma den k co ban ma con noi chien nhu ben mjnh co loi vay do.. Y bao ve noi mjnh dat 5h30 ma 6h moi den trong khi mjnh am con va bame den 5h30 dug hoi le tan da ngo ngat k bit gi hoi ai dat so nao dat ban vvv minh moi dug doi e trai mjnh den luc 5h40 cung k den 6h nhu thanh bv noi minh noi lai thi ong moi im keu thay tui nay dug doi o day tu may gio chua ma bao 6h moi den vi e trai dat ban goi so nao goi dug so da dat ban thi a ql ra hinh nhu so qly ..Trog khi dat so qly lun vi mjnh thay a k mac ao trag dong phuc ma mat ao tu do .moi hum nay chu dau.. Top mjnh bo dy quan khac lun.quan thuy kieu gan ven song chu dau an 12 mon ca nua ket bia 7 lon nuoc ngon no banh bung gia bill co 1078k chua chac den wuan chu teo da dc nhu vay ma chua wa dc khoi cua nua da tuc no bung dy ve co may top kh nghe ben gd mjnh da dat ban truoc ma van k co ban trog khi ho dat ban hoi sag cung ngay ma den van k co ban .day mjnh hoi dat truoc ban lam j den k chuan bi ban cho ng ta...trog khj dat 5h30 rat som...du quan co phat trien dong den may ma pv kieu nay kh den mot lan rui cug dy.. Hua voi long mot lan rui thui k bao h gioi thieu ai den quan nua.. Danh du lun do.. Phai noi quan pv k co logic...that te.thay gi nhan dc loi xl tu quan nhug co le rag gd mjnh k can dau vi dy an tra tien ma trau truc kieu nay k them ban nhe...

So amazing ! ! ! The waiter is friendly , the uniform are so elegant and the food and drink are so so cool
It ' s not easy to find a cosy place in Vietnam especially in Ha_Noi , where we can sit down and enjoy a warm brewing cup of tea with variety of lovely dessert . I was fortunate to be invited to D ' Alice , just as the name it is the wonderland where Alice entered . The atmosphere is phenomenal and the high - quality food is undeniable . Hence this is an unmissable hidden wonder for a person who is addicted to a cuppa and a tasty surprise .

It is called Ding_Ding , or scored , or winner ! Either way , the all you can eat hot pot is all of the above ! For 250K each it is not the cheapest but we ate our hearts out ! The tom yum soup base was quite nice although a slightly stronger flavour would have been better . Papaya salad was quite nice but there was no shrimps . A complimentary thai ice drink was quite ordinary as it was sour and syrupy ! They threw in a plate of fried goodies which were awesome though !

A local watering hole , popular with the regulars for a game of darts and pool . The atmosphere is homely and the staffs are friendly . Live bands on evenings of Wednesdays to Saturdays on the upstairs area . If you rather a quiet drink with friends , then downstairs is a better option . The food quality is also good - I had the curry grilled wings & the grill sanma fish with kimchi side . Overall , recommended to go and have a drink , and make some new friends .

That su la rat thich mon mien xao o day , khong gian dep va gia noi chung cung tuong doi la cao . Van de o day minh muon noi sau hon ve cach phuc vu cua nhan vien , khach thi ko han la dong , nhung cung ngoi het day gan cua kieng , khongg he co ai dung gan nhung ban do de phuc vu cho khach khi can , nhan vien khoang 4 nguoi va ca quan ly nua . TRÃNH_XA !
My friends and I wanted to go to bo ke which was reccomended by our hotel but our taxi driver brought us to another place . Firstly the servers were not helpful in taking our orders or any of our requests . Seeing that out table was full , the lady simply stacked a new dish on top of the previous dish without considering that we were not finished with that dish ( an omelette ) . Secondly , the food served were not only not fresh but inedible ! The squid was charred black . The fish was overcooked with its flesh stuck to the aluminum foils . The fish soup was utterly untouchable and the taste was horrid ! We ordered oysters but was served with what looked and tasted nothing like oysters ! The only thing edible was the omelette and the fried rice . Having such an awful experience , we wanted to feedback to the servers and management . However , they were not interested in our feedback at all and completely ignored us . With such bad attitude and bad food , we left even without finishing the meal . The meal was obviously overpriced paying 2.5million for 7pax . This place is a scam ! Do not visit !
